item.title: Trump says Xi assured him China won't take action on Taiwan while he's in the White House
item.description: President Donald Trump says that Chinese President Xi Jinping assured him Beijing would take no action toward Taiwan while the Republican leader is in...

item.title: Michigan lawyer says a Halloween terror plot that FBI Director Kash Patel described never existed
item.description: A Michigan defense lawyer is disputing allegations his 20-year-old client and four other young suspects were planning a terror attack.

item.title: Voters express frustration with Trump's handling of economy, NBC News poll shows
item.description: More than 60% of registered voters recently polled said Trump's administration has fallen short of expectations regarding the economy.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says SNAP food benefits could restart by Wednesday
item.description: SNAP food benefits could restart as early as Wednesday, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Sunday.

item.title: Trump tariffs could add $40 billion to holiday shoppers' and sellers' costs, LendingTree warns
item.description: It has been six months since President Donald Trump announced new "liberation day" tariffs, which are a key part of his trade agenda.
